name: Weaviate OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Weaviate OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: Health Status of Weaviate nodes
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the node is `UNAVAILABLE`, `WARNING` if `UNHEALTHY` and `OK` if `HEALTHY`.

name: Weaviate liveness HTTP check
description: Returns `OK` if liveness endpoint returns a 200 response, otherwise returns `CRITICAL`.
